title: Will be be seeing changes to champions that rocketed with pre season changes?
body:
ok well I'm going to use Yasou for this example as many people know his gotten out of hand, id like to add that i do enjoy the pre seasons and if nothing happens so be it but it needs to be considered when a player is in 100% of games something has happened

Yasou- a champion that has always had alot of early game lead with being able to dash around 6-7 times each wave to easily dodge and out maneuver skill shots, along with no mana usage and his Q with a low cd that can be used defensively if he cant get in there, he is a great mid lane champion and why he gets picked alot, i've always thought he is counter-able and nothing to scary,

Come the new pre season masteries and item changes he has jumped the gun way too much, 2 items i see built on him every game are Shiv and Tri-force which give him 100% Criticle strike and alot more poke with shiv and sheen procs, they are also relatively cheap items compared to many ap or other ad items ontop of that he now has a 15% hp heal every 2 seconds which could be said about every second attack, 
with these changes i've seen him 100% of my games around 30-40 games straight 

he is still somewhat counterable but he has become overly strong and his such a straight forward easy to learn champ that his become flavour of the month, i just feel he needs a little bit of a touch up with the new changes,

(dont hate on this post but i feel many people can somewhat agree that he has gotten the biggest buff and i just want riot to know even if they feel he doesnt need to be changed)
